tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlayerInteractions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  object_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
  geographical_point GEOGRAPHY
);

CREATE TABLE player_interactions (
    player_id UUID,
    object_id UUID,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    geo_point GEOMETRY(POINT)
);
CREATE TABLE player_interaction_logs (player_id INT, object_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), geographical_point_id INT);
CREATE TABLE players (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(100), player_level INT);
CREATE TABLE game_objects (object_id INT PRIMARY KEY, object_name VARCHAR(100), object_type VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE geographical_points (geographical_point_id INT PRIMARY KEY, latitude DECIMAL(9,6), longitude DECIMAL(9,6));

CREATE TABLE player_interactions_at_points (
  player_id INT,
  object_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);
